title: Staring down the Fed Tank like

replies.body:
Staring down?

Nah, fam, it's a dance off. Whether tank or juggernaut, it's always a dance off.

I guess Garen will never lose.
https://media.giphy.com/media/uR6julmSW90mk/giphy.gif?noredirect
You cannot defeat one who channels the moves of Johnny Bravo.

"It's been a long road, but I'm finally at 6 stacks, level 16, elixir of Iron. Now FEEL MY WRATH" {{champion:31}} 

"Kek, outplayed" {{champion:114}}

Not gonna lie, didn't know what the anime was.

Just found a gif, thought of a caption, and posted!
So many people here do that...
